Sentence.sentence: Thus was born the idea of the Grand Tour, a practice which introduced Englishmen, Germans, Scandinavians, and also Americans to the art and culture of France and Italy for the next 300 years.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The current low fossil fuel price environment will thus certainly delay the energy transition from fossil fuel to clean energy sources.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By making the effort to organize and label files so others can understand them, scientists become more organized and better disciplined themselves, thus avoiding confusion later on.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Environmental campaigns that tell us how many people drive SUVs unwittingly ( ' ,  不经意地 ) imply that this behaviour is widespread and thus permissible.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Thus talking came first;writing is just a craft that came along later.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In writing about their own experiences many applicants slip into clichés, thus failing to engage the reader.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Educators may fear that children hearing two languages will become permanently confused and thus their language development will be delayed ;this concern is not documented in the literature
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Poor practices in harvesting, storage and transportation have resulted in a waste of much of the food we produce and thus a waste of land and resources.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They allow young people to exchange moment-by-moment experiences in their daily lives with special partners and thus to have a more continuous sense of connection with friends
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Thus traumatized (受到创伤) the economy might have gone into a free fall ending in depression.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The US government thus needs to act as well.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Copyright laws differ from country to country, but in general protection extends for the duration of an author's life and for a substantial period afterwards, thus allowing the author's heirs to benefit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Outside the US, Google has made sure only to scan books that are out of copyright and thus in the "public domain" (works such as the Bodleian's first edition of Middle march, which anyone can read for free on Google Books Search)
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As for us, we've started using our plane time as a work-free zone, and thus time to dip into the recovery phase.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Environmental campaigns that tell us how many people drive SUVs unwittingly (不经意地) imply that this behaviour is widespread and thus permissible.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Just earlier this year, the European Parliament voted in favor of legislation that would stop grocery giants from unfair trading practices that result in overproduction, thus creating waste.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Our study will use a large corporate dataset from a major medical company to examine how technology extends our working hours and thus interferes with necessary cognitive recovery, resulting in huge health care costs and turnover costs for employers.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Protein supplements may overburden some internal organ, thus leading to its malfunctioning.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So here's another way in which smartphones might transform the way we live and work: by offering insights into human psychology and behavior and, thus, supporting smarter social science.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The limited research conducted thus far indicates they're especially dominant among those who value independence over cooperation, and harmony over confrontation.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Thus the more imbalanced we become due to overworking, the more value there is in activities that allow us to return to a state of balance.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Thus, body weight is not always the best indicator of health and a thin person still needs to eat well and exercise regularly.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Thus, by telling others that we are busy and working all the time, we are implicitly suggesting that we are sought after, which enhances our perceived status.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Thus, our picture of Venus at around the time life was getting started on Earth is one of warm oceans, probably rich with organic molecules, splashing around rocky shores and volcanic vents.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Thus, while printing enormously increased access to books by making cheap, high-volume production possible, it also reduced choice.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连接副词均有"因此，所以"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus
means: accordingly ：书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
consequently ：正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。
hence ：较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
so ：用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
therefore ：通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
thus ：多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。

Sentence.sentence: Thus, the division, on the whole, depends on the reader.

entry.def: You use thus to show that what you are about to mention is the result or consequence of something else that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: Neither of them thought of turning on the lunch-time news. Thus Caroline didn't hear of John's death until Peter telephoned...
example.tran: 两个人谁也没有想到打开电视看午间新闻，所以直到彼得打来电话，卡罗琳才得知约翰的死讯。

example.ex: Even in a highly skilled workforce some people will be more capable and thus better paid than others.
example.tran: 就算是在技术高度熟练的劳动者中，也会有人能力更强，因此，薪水也就更高。

entry.def: If you say that something is thus or happens thus you mean that it is, or happens, as you have just described or as you are just about to describe.

example.ex: Joanna was pouring the drink. While she was thus engaged, Charles sat on one of the bar-stools...
example.tran: 乔安娜正在倒酒。就在她正忙的当儿，查尔斯坐在了一张酒吧凳子上。

example.ex: Martin helped his father dig the water gardens out by hand. Thus he discovered his interest in gardening.
example.tran: 马丁亲手帮他父亲修建起了水景园，就这样对园艺产生了兴趣。

means.word_mean: 1. an aromatic gum resin obtained from various Arabian or East African trees; formerly valued for worship and for embalming and fumigation
1. (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result;

sentences.sentence: "the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory"
"it is late and thus we must go"
"the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted"
"set up the pieces thus"; (`thusly' is a nonstandard variant)
